data.title: Singing guitarist in Croydon
data.meta_description: Hire Mr Wright, a Singing guitarist in Croydon, plus a range of other Singing guitarist available to book with Encore.
data.text: Mr Wright is a Scottish singer/guitarist based in London who provides a mix of upbeat and laid-back music, with a passion for forgotten classics, to keep you and your guests entertained. Playing everything from KT Tunstall to the Spice Girls, there will always be something for your event. He is highly experienced as both a performing solo musician and DJ, playing across the UK and USA at events and festivals or in the recording studio. Mr Wright is the perfect addition to your event.
